thread.title: Great Hotel - Friendly helpful staff, very clean rooms.
thread.title_full: Great Hotel - Friendly helpful staff, very clean rooms. - Review of Hotel La Parizienne by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Beth J
title: Great Hotel - Friendly helpful staff, very clean rooms.
text:
Only one slight criticism is we stayed for 4 nights and only on the last night were tea and coffee making facilities put in our room. We weren't really that fussed so didn't ask the staff.
Great hotel, friendly staff, the rooms are small but very clean. The beds are SO COMFY.
I would only not recommend this hotel if you are a wheel chair user - tiny lifts and very tight corners in the corridors/hallway. They may have rooms on the ground floor to accommodate this (I'm not sure).
